channel.title: New Headset for Gaming
channel.description: Hey guys. I am looking to buy myself a new headest for gaming, since the one i have is dead, and was crap when i had it. I am looking currently at the Logitech G930, and looking for other people's opinion. Most of the reviews online say its awesome, but I want your opinion. If you have any others that you think are better, please post a link. Keep the price under $200 if possible :slight_smile: thanks :pirate:

item.title: New Headset for Gaming
item.dc:creator: gordan_forman
item.description:
Tritton AX pro.
https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16826235005&cm_re=tritton_ax_pro--26-235-005--Product

Best headset i’ve ever used. It’s not simulated surround sound, there are dedicated speakers for front, center etc. that make it real surround.

Read full topic

item.title: New Headset for Gaming
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Eh, my $70 Razer Characarias does the trick just fine. Great stereo sound and comfortable as holy hell. The mic is pretty decent too.

“Surround” headphones don’t do much for me.

Read full topic

item.title: New Headset for Gaming
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
Pricey, but I’d recommend G35’s too

Read full topic

item.title: New Headset for Gaming
item.dc:creator: Fuskox
item.description:
Logitech G35 is really nice, I got it on an open box deal from Newegg for like 80. 7.1 Surround, noise cancelling, voice morphing, good sound quality and really durable! I love them.

Read full topic

item.title: New Headset for Gaming
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Plantronic headsets are usually good. I got a Gamecom model which is really good quality and cost about 50€.

Read full topic
